title: What if Veigar's R stopped mid-air if his target became untargetable
body:
And then resumed upon them becoming vulnerable again


It'd be broken, but it'd also be really funny to see that
It'd make me feel better about Fizz


EDIT:
Community Response:
http://www.gifbin.com/bin/320sw0sw7847.gif

replies.body: It would be funny, but  I say it should decrease with size, until they are targetable again, and if they survive long enough, and the ult shrinks away, you live.

As a Veigar main I find this both funny and amusing. I would give my left nut to watch a hecarim try to ult away and outrun my ult.
I had a gankplank burn his flash trying to run from my ult XP

> [{quoted}](name=PiRoScOuT,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GAZugEgA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-14T22:57:19.811+0000)
>
>  I say it should decrease with size

...is that a short joke? or a short fuse joke?
I had honestly forgotten {{champion:115}} exists until you said that.

It kinda makes sense, since it feeds on their power (aka enemy ap scaling), if they vanish, it'll start fading away unless they re-appear, then it'll continue haunting its target. It shouldn't lose its power as it travels, because that'll make the current version of itself trash, it would only start losing power if there is nothing to burst. Heck, that'd be so funny to watch xP but meh, something like this will never enter the game.

Oh, but I still can try it in the sandbox mode that Riot has just released! RIGHT?!
Or make it circle the untargetable champ if it reaches them. And then just blow them up once they become targetable.
would it leap up and slam down like a blue shell?
It'd be funny if Riot made a Veigar skin where it became a Blue Turtle Shell just to do that...
It wouldn't be OP, it would just be a hard counter. Hard counters are not a good thing in general - they make the opponent feel crap.

I feel like Fizz players should feel some more crap.

But then again, im sure they already are with the juggs

But untargetability hard counters targeted abilities.

:/

Armor penetration counters armor, which is supposed to be a counter to AD, but that's apparently alright too


I'm really bitter about AD itemization LOL

As funny as it sounds, building more armor can counter penetration, and health too if the target isn't a strong BORK user.

Why?

{{item:3134}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3707}} the flat armor pen items. Pretty expensive. Unless you're a glass cannon champion, warrior and just brutalizer are expensive compared to {{item:1029}} that negates the difference. As for last whisper, your armor is still useful it's not just *as* useful. As annoying as that may be, it helps keeps tanks from being unkillable late-game. 

Though with the recent armor/health item nerfs, you'd think they would give LW 5 more AD and reduce the armor pen to 30%, but that's just me.

You know what annoys me more tho? I main support/jungle, but even I'm annoyed by this one thing in midlane:

{{item:3020}} vs {{item:3111}}. 100 gold difference, but that 100 gold gives merc a 10 MR advantage *and* a really useful passive. So if an AD assassin is vs a mage...

Not to mention sorc boots is countered by {{item:3105}}. Not as bad (Aegis is a very nice item!), it just sucks when the AD assassin built merc treads. :/
I didn't say Fizz was good design :P

Zonya's is already a hard counter.

when zed ults a target and if the target dies before the deathmark debuff can apply his ult  goes on a 5s cd
since veigars ult is so impactfull for veigar, I think if veigar ults a target and it dies or becomes invulnerable before the ult hits, it should reset the cd to 5s like zeds
Caitlyn's ult has similar effects too, if her target goes untargetable or dies before she fires the shot, her ult goes on a 5 seconds cd as well!
{{champion:80}} can cancel his (or if he gets stunned) and it goes on 10 second cd as well. but {{champion:104}} still cant have a cigar!!!

The difference being in this case is that the projectile is fired and the CD for his ultimate is already ticking. While I agree it shouldn't fizzle your ult if they die before it goes off, the issue here would be one with coding. It would require either a CD reduction if no target is hit or for the CD to go off when the ultimate  hits, and be much shorter if it does not.
But muh play$
The thing with Zed's ult thought is that it also gap-closes. Where other ults only fire a projectile, Zed is the projectile.
While we're at it, make it go around Wind Wall.

Nah, it should shatter the wind wall (and any other walls it passes through like those from Karthus Trundle Anivia, J4 etc) causing the wall to explode for 10% max hp true damage to all enemies withing 1000 range of the wall due to the primordial energy interacting with the lesser magic of these pitiful walls.
I think it would be even more hilarious to just watch it go around the corner of the windwall and then nuke that yasuo anyway
No offense man, but fuck no.

Obviously that's a heck-no balance wise
But it's a funny concept
